|l| Truetryhard
|c| Aligax|gg
|l| The Lucky Luxray's
|c|☆Tullstoy|I screwed up hard with the Mawile sac. Thought for sure you'd be prepping something to handle a water switch
|c|☆BugCatcherWeevil|i completely scrwed up with the silvally bring, i thought ud bring silvally ghost xD
|c|☆Tullstoy|That's a hard mon to play around as a lead lmao
|c|☆BugCatcherWeevil|yeah thats true
|c|☆BugCatcherWeevil|i was actually pretty afraid of sth like specs hurricane pelipper^^
|l| Flowerpowered
|c|☆Tullstoy|I didn't really trust the speed control to bring something that ballsy haha. I debated on a tailwind bring for Whimsicott which would have helped that set but opted to go for something more defensive
|c|☆Tullstoy|The stun spore miss hurt in the moment but obviously doesn't change a thing in hindsight. Should have just stuck with my gut instead of trying to play a slow game with status
|l| Aligax
|c|☆Tullstoy|Ahh well. Live and learn
|c|☆Tullstoy|Hopefully I get the chance at a mulligan in playoffs
|c|☆BugCatcherWeevil|yeah oftentimes one makes achange
|c|☆Tullstoy|Anyway gg! Have a nice weekend, Jonas!
|c|☆BugCatcherWeevil|and it doesnt pay off :
|c|☆BugCatcherWeevil|gg, you too!
|c|☆Tullstoy|Know that feel haha
|c|☆BugCatcherWeevil|gl for the rest of the season
|c|☆Tullstoy|Same to you, not that you need it hahaha
|c|☆BugCatcherWeevil|luck is always helpful haha
|c|☆Tullstoy|That it is
|l|☆Tullstoy
|c|☆BugCatcherWeevil|see ya!
|l|☆BugCatcherWeevil
|j| TwatManPrime
|j| Aligax
